description.text: This spell functions like greater polymorph, except that it changes one object or creature into another. You can use this spell to transform all manner of objects and creatures into new forms--you aren't limited to transforming a living creature into another living form. The duration of the spell depends on how radical a change is made from the original state to its transmuted state. The duration is determined by using the following guidelines.

sections.Components: V, S, M/DF (mercury, gum arabic, and smoke)
sections.Targets: one creature, or one nonmagical object of up to 100 cu. ft./level
